code: import{ADD_WIDGET,DELETE_WIDGET,MOVE_WIDGET,UPDATE_WIDGET}from'./types';export var addWidget=function addWidget(event){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:ADD_WIDGET,payload:event.target[0].value});};};export var deleteWidget=function deleteWidget(event){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:DELETE_WIDGET,payload:event});};};export var updateWidget=function updateWidget(event){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:UPDATE_WIDGET,payload:event});};};export var moveWidget=function moveWidget(event){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:MOVE_WIDGET,payload:event});};};
